text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Is it not the job of the hospital doctors to assess the patients health before releasing them from hospital?(not gov ministers) I don’t believe any doctor would release patients back to care homes if they suspect them of having  Covid-19 #PiersMorgan is chatting rubbish as usual
